post.summary: Add or Edit Offer Deal Banner

id.description: Send id to update existing banner
Send id to update existing banner

banners.description: JSON array describing multiple banners. When submitting via multipart/form-data send this as a JSON string in the `banners` field and attach images using the `image_field` name or matching section_key.

id.description: Optional existing banner id to update

section_key.description: Unique key for the banner (home_banner_one, blog_banner_two, etc.)

image_field.description: Optional form-data field name that carries the image for this banner. Defaults to using section_key based names when omitted.

bulk.summary: Create or update multiple banners in one request
